#include<cstdio>
# include <algorithm>
#include<climits>
using namespace std;
struct clas
{
    int start,end;
}cls[1000010];

bool operator<(const clas& t1,const clas& t2)
{
	return t1.end<t2.end;
}

int main()
{
int t,n,i,j,ans,strt;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
scanf("%d",&n);
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
scanf("%d %d",&cls[i].start,&cls[i].end);
sort(cls,cls+n);
strt=-1000000000;ans=0;
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
if(strt<=cls[i].start){strt=cls[i].end;ans++;}
printf("%d\n",ans);
}
return 0;
}
